Text: Anybody who has this movie, would they please reseed?  I missed it the first time around.  This is an absolute comedy classic.
Please re-seed. It looks like there are several of us out here stuck on 86%. I've been looking for a copy of this movie for a long time, I agree, it's a classic.

Nobody's ever going to come back and reseed this gem of a torrent? I last saw this movie in 1973. It's a riot. Vincent Price at his comedic best. Please reseed. I'd like to find this movie again before I die.
